amendment.description: An amendment numbered 100 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds made available by this Act from being used to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the draft Management Plan and Environmental Impact Statement for public lands managed by the Redding and Arcata field offices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
